title: Just.Cause.3.Steam.Preload.Unlocker-MERCS213
description:
Install instructions:
NOTE: Requires Just.Cause.3.Steam.Preload-MERCS213 and Just.Cause.3.Steam.Preload.Part.2-MERCS213
- Move all files to the depotcache folder found in the preload torrent
- Run Unpack.bat
- This may take some time to unpack, so DO NOT close it!
- A new folder that contains the unlocked game will be created in the same directory as the unlocker
- Once it is done unpacking, you may delete the .csm and .csm files 
- Wait for crack, game has Denuvo 
Credits: sam2k8 takes all credit for making this unlocker. thank you.
From sam2k8 - If sisInstall freezes, go to windows region and language setting, then administrative tab and set the system locale to English (US) and restart your pc
